# Unholy Ice Weapon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]], [[Evil Spells|evil]], [[Water Spells|water]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a flask of unholy water, or 5 pounds of powdered silver worth 25 gp)

**Range:** 0 ft.

**Effect:** One ice weapon

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 198

This spell functions as *[[Holy Ice Weapon (Spell)|holy ice weapon]]*, except the weapon is made of frozen unholy water, and instead deals additional damage to creatures that are susceptible to unholy water.
